parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance for which you want to modify the configurations.

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description:
The type of configuration modifications. Valid values:

*   Upgrade: upgrades the configurations of the instance.
*   Downgrade: downgrades the configurations of the instance.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: The type of the service to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: subscription
*   PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go
